entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 20 April 2023
